--------------------------------------------------------
How to get support:

Non-customers

- Submitting questions at Stack Overflow (http://stackoverflow.com/) 
  with the "TeeChart" and product platform tags.
- Non-customers have read-only access to the customer resources below.

Customers

- Submitting questions at our online forums
  (https://www.steema.com/support/index.php).
  Please note that customer forums are read-only for non-customers.
- Document resources at http://www.teechart.net/reference/index.php.

Latest version information posted at:

- http://www.steema.com/versioninfo/net
--------------------------------------------------------
